module.p: Eaglais nam Manach Liatha Greyfriars Kirk is a toponymic name-description.

section.p:
Some examples –
Tha Eaglais nam Manach Liath co-cheangailte ri eachdraidh nan Cùmhnantach.
Greyfriars Kirk is connected with the history of the Covenanters. Eaglais nam Manach Liath

Some examples –
’S e eaglais pharaiste Eaglais na h-Alba ann an Dùn Èideann a th’ ann an Eaglais nam Manach Liath.
Greyfriars Kirk is a parish church of the Church of Scotland located in Edinburgh. Eaglais nam Manach Liath
Tha carragh-cuimhne mòr do Dhonnchadh Bàn ann an Eaglais nam Manach Liath ann an Dùn Èideann.
There is a large memorial to Duncan Ban in Greyfriars Kirk in Edinburgh. Donnchadh Bàn Mac an t-Saoir
